The P4P scheme had the greatest effect on services w/the highest payment rates the least effort.

citation.abstract: Evidence about the best methods with which to accelerate progress towards achieving the Millennium Development Goals is urgently needed. We assessed the effect of performance-based payment of health-care providers (payment for performance; P4P) on use and quality of child and maternal care services in health-care facilities in Rwanda.
citation.title: Effect on maternal and child health services in Rwanda of payment to primary health-care providers for performance: an impact evaluation
